short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new-tab Chrome extension that brings a little bit more of Ukraine to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This small extension will bring new backgrounds from Ukrainian photographers and inspirational quotes from famous Ukrainians. From Ukrainians for Ukrainians with love.
